<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Warrior](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=35)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 64 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

In your younger days, you waded into battle as a mercenary, a warrior defending a nomadic people, or a member of a militia or army. You might have wanted to break out from the regimented structure of these forces, or you could have always been as independent a warrior as you are now.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength
or Constitution, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) skill, and the [Warfare Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Intimidating Glare](/Feats.aspx?ID=796) skill feat.
